New Records: Devin Booker has recorded a double-double in each of the last three games, tying his career-long streak of consecutive double-doubles at 3

Devin Booker (34 points, 8 assists) and Kevin Durant (30 points, 8 assists) became the first Suns duo since the 1991-92 season (Jeff Hornacek & Dan Majerle) to record 30+ points and 8+ assists in the same game on Dec.13, 2024 at Utah
Key Match Events: The Suns used an 11-3 run to go up eight (96-88) with 1:10 to go in the third quarter, and Phoenix never trailed the rest of the way
Bradley Beal and Grayson Allen each scored 20+ points off the bench on Jan. 9 vs. ATL, the first set of Suns teammates to each score 20+ points off the bench in the same game since Jan. 16, 2022
Pre-Game Insights: The Suns improved to 17-19 on the season following a 123-115 win over the Hawks Thursday night in Phoenix
Mike Budenholzer won his 500th career regular season game as an NBA head coach, becoming the 38th coach in league history to the milestone
Post-Match Reflections: With Booker, Durant, Beal and Allen each scoring 20+ points, the game marked the first time since March 14, 2024 that at least four Suns players scored 20+ points in the same game
The Suns have now won 14-straight games when shooting 57+% from the field and holding their opponent to under 50% shooting and improved to 166-6 all-time in such games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns have made 505 three-pointers in the first 35 games of this season, the most in franchise history in the first 35 games of a season
Devin Booker needs 381 more points to surpass Walter Davis as the Suns all-time leading scorer
Others: The Suns enter this season having reached the playoffs in each of the last four seasons, matching their longest such stretch (four-straight from 2005-2008) since doing so in 13-straight from 1989-2001
Since the start of the 2020-21 season, the Suns hold a combined regular season record 226-128, the second-best record in the NBA over the last five seasons (trails Boston)
